summary: This document appears to be a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) population monitoring census or roster generated on June 17, 2019, for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. It is a data retrieval output showing inmate population statistics, likely including Jeffrey Epstein who was in custody there at that time.

events.title: BOP Population Census at MCC New York
events.description: The Bureau of Prisons generated a population monitoring census/roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, showing inmate statistics including totals by registration, conditions, and other categories.

keyFacts: Document is a Bureau of Prisons population monitoring census/roster dated June 17, 2019.
Data retrieval appears to be for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, facility type 'T' (likely a temporary detention or metropolitan correctional center).
The document shows inmate population statistics including registration numbers, conditions, and other administrative categories.
This document was generated approximately two months before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody at MCC New York in August 2019.
The document reference 'BROJO 530*07' suggests it's a Bureau of Prisons document from the New York region.
